abilities.name: Type Shift
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Salamence ex's type is Fire until the end of your turn.

attacks.name: Dual Stream
attacks.effect: You may do 40 damage instead of 80 to the Defending Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
